translated: Some say that it is in accordance with

original: rgan rims bzhin la phyag byas nas tha mal pa'i phyogs su bsdad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni tha mal pa'i phyogs lkog tu gyur pa ma yin pa dge slong thams cad 'dun pa gang yin ba der bsdad par bya'o //🔽sgra bskyung ba dang mdzes pa dang shin tu bsdams pa dang spyod lam ran par ro zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rgan rims bzhin la phyag byas nas tha mal pa'i phyogs su bsdad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni tha mal pa'i phyogs lkog tu gyur pa ma yin pa dge slong thams cad 'dun pa gang yin ba der bsdad par bya'o // sgra bskyung ba dang mdzes pa dang shin tu bsdams pa dang spyod lam ran par ro zhes bya ba ni /
translated: In the ordinary folk's area, which is not hidden, all the monks gather.🔽He should sit down in the ordinary folk's area, with a low voice, gracefully, very restrained, and with a proper deportment.

original: shin tu bsdams pa dang spyod lam ran par ro //
analyzed: shin tu bsdams pa dang spyod lam ran par ro //
translated: He should sit down in the ordinary folk's area, with a low voice, gracefully, very restrained, and with a proper deportment.

original: 'dir ni ma mo dag las /
analyzed: 'dir ni ma mo dag las /
translated: Here, in the Mātṛkā, it is said:

original: tha mal pa'i phyogs su zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so//
analyzed: tha mal pa'i phyogs su zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so//
translated: In the ordinary folk's area, etc.

original: mi shes na zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mi shes na zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If he does not know,

original: 'dir sil bu dag las /
analyzed: 'dir sil bu dag las /
translated: here, in the Sthavira's text, it is said:

original: de la sogs pa bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de la sogs pa bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: One should do this and that.🔽 One who knows the reason should greet him.

original: rgyus shes pa dang ldan pas bsu bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni gang gis de'i rgyus shes pa ni de la 'di ni che ge mo zhig nas 'ongs so //
analyzed: rgyus shes pa dang ldan pas bsu bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni gang gis de'i rgyus shes pa ni de la 'di ni che ge mo zhig nas 'ongs so //
translated: One who knows the reason for that thinks, He has come from such and such a place.

original: che ge mo zhig gi lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas yin no zhes des bsu zhing @138a * //
analyzed: che ge mo zhig gi lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas yin no zhes des bsu zhing @138a * //
translated: He is the companion and attendant of so-and-so.

original: rang gnas su dal bsor gzhug pa dang cham du dbab par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gnas su dal bsor gzhug pa dang cham du dbab par bya'o //
translated: He should be received and led slowly to his own place and be made to relax.

original: rgyus kyi sgras ni de shes par brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: rgyus kyi sgras ni de shes par brjod pa yin te /
translated: The word because indicates the reason for that.

original: de gang la yod pa des zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de gang la yod pa des zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: by that reason.🔽 If he does not know, he should not be received, even if he is a solitary buddha.

original: mi shes na mu gcig pa yin yang bsu bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni gzhan du mu gcig pa dang bsu bar mi bya ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad do ;
analyzed: mi shes na mu gcig pa yin yang bsu bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni gzhan du mu gcig pa dang bsu bar mi bya ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad do ;
translated: The meaning is: not only a solitary buddha, but also someone else should not be received.

original: / sgo chod cig tshol na ma sbyin cig len na bzlog cig ces bcol ba khas blangs nas yal bar bor ram /
analyzed: / sgo chod cig tshol na ma sbyin cig len na bzlog cig ces bcol ba khas blangs nas yal bar bor ram /
translated: If he is entrusted with a message, such as Close the door, Do not give anything, Stop him from taking, and he accepts it but neglects it,

original: 'di kho bo'i grogs po yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gis yid gcugs pa'i dngos po nyid du bsgrubs pa la brlab par gyur na gzhal bar bya ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'di kho bo'i grogs po yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gis yid gcugs pa'i dngos po nyid du bsgrubs pa la brlab par gyur na gzhal bar bya ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: or if he establishes a relationship of trust by saying This is my friend, and so on, and then betrays that trust, he should be abandoned.

original: ji ltar yid gcugs pa'i dngos po nyid du bsgrubs pa las yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar yid gcugs pa'i dngos po nyid du bsgrubs pa las yin zhe na /
translated: How is it established as a trustworthy person?🔽Therefore, one should rely on a trustworthy person, because one should not abandon him, having accepted him with such words as “He is my friend.”

original: de'i phyir 'di kho bo'i grogs po yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gis khas blangs nas yal bar bor na rnam pa 'di gnyis ni gnyug mar gnas pa dang / glo bur du 'ongs pa gnyis ka bye brag med pa nyid du shes par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di kho bo'i grogs po yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gis khas blangs nas yal bar bor na rnam pa 'di gnyis ni gnyug mar gnas pa dang / glo bur du 'ongs pa gnyis ka bye brag med pa nyid du shes par bya ste /
translated: One should understand that these two aspects are not distinguished as to whether they are natural or adventitious.🔽Therefore, it is said, “One should rely on a trustworthy person.”

original: de'i phyir yid ches pa la brten par bya'o zhes bya ba smos so ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir yid ches pa la brten par bya'o zhes bya ba smos so ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: de'i phyir gzhan gyis mi shes pa'i bye brag brtag pa ni thabs yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gzhan gyis mi shes pa'i bye brag brtag pa ni thabs yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is said, “The investigation of the specific things that others do not know is the means.”

original: dbul bar bya ba ltung na'o zhes bya ba ni dbul bar bya ba'i dngos po len bar byed pa'i lag tu ma song bar 'bab chu la sogs pa'i nang du lhung nas 'dzin ma nus na zhes bya ba don gyis rig par bya'o //
analyzed: dbul bar bya ba ltung na'o zhes bya ba ni dbul bar bya ba'i dngos po len bar byed pa'i lag tu ma song bar 'bab chu la sogs pa'i nang du lhung nas 'dzin ma nus na zhes bya ba don gyis rig par bya'o //
translated: “If the thing to be given falls down” means that if the thing to be given falls into a river, etc., before it reaches the hand of the one who is to receive it, and he is unable to grasp it, one should understand the meaning as follows.

original: ci rnam pa thams cad du 'am zhe na /
analyzed: ci rnam pa thams cad du 'am zhe na /
translated: Is it in every way?

original: de'i phyir gal te ma blangs par btang na'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gal te ma blangs par btang na'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, if it is given without being accepted, then it is not to be given.

original: gal te gang la dbul ba des ma blangs par 'bul bar byed pas btang na ni des na bul bar byed pas gzhal bar bya ba nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te gang la dbul ba des ma blangs par 'bul bar byed pas btang na ni des na bul bar byed pas gzhal bar bya ba nyid ma yin no //
translated: If the giver gives without the recipient accepting, then it is not to be given.

original: de la bag med par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir dri bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de la bag med par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir dri bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: In order to avoid carelessness, one should ask,

original: de la zhes bya ba ni ma blangs pa de la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni ma blangs pa de la'o //
translated: “In that case,” means in the case of not accepting.

original: khyod kyis zin tam 'on te ma zin ces bya ba'i tshig gis tha snyad du bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyod kyis zin tam 'on te ma zin ces bya ba'i tshig gis tha snyad du bya ba'o //
translated: With the words “Have you obtained it or not?” one should make a conventional statement.

original: de'i phyir zin tam ma zin ces brjod na zin pa nyid du rnam par gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir zin tam ma zin ces brjod na zin pa nyid du rnam par gzhag par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, if one says “Have you obtained it or not?” it should be determined as obtained.

original: brnyas pa mi gtsang bas ma rung bar 'gyur ba bkru ba la sogs pas sems gzung bar ma grub na rin skyin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: brnyas pa mi gtsang bas ma rung bar 'gyur ba bkru ba la sogs pas sems gzung bar ma grub na rin skyin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If it is not established that the mind is held by washing and so on, which are not suitable due to the impurity of contempt, then it is the price.

original: gang gi phyir de son pa la smos te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de son pa la smos te /
translated: Because it is said to be obtained for that reason.

original: gzhan du yang cho ga 'di sbyar ba zhes bya ba bye brag ma smos pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan du yang cho ga 'di sbyar ba zhes bya ba bye brag ma smos pa'o //
translated: Also, in other cases, this rite is applied means that it is not specified.

original: zhar la byung ba'i skab song zin to /
analyzed: zhar la byung ba'i skab song zin to /
translated: The digression is finished.

original: // / rgyus shes pa dang ldan pas bsu bar bya'o zhes gang smos pa de la ji ltar bsu bar bya zhe na lhung bzed dang chos @138b gos blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: // / rgyus shes pa dang ldan pas bsu bar bya'o zhes gang smos pa de la ji ltar bsu bar bya zhe na lhung bzed dang chos @138b gos blang bar bya'o //
translated: As for what was said, one should receive with knowledge of the reason, how should one receive? One should take the alms bowl and Dharma robes.

original: stan gding bar bya'o //
analyzed: stan gding bar bya'o //
translated: One should prepare a seat.

original: rkang pa bkru bar 'gron du gnyer bar bya'o //
analyzed: rkang pa bkru bar 'gron du gnyer bar bya'o //
translated: One should invite to wash the feet.

original: chus kyang ngo zhes bya ba ni btung ba'i don du chus 'gron du bsnyen par bya'o zhes bya ba don gyis rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: chus kyang ngo zhes bya ba ni btung ba'i don du chus 'gron du bsnyen par bya'o zhes bya ba don gyis rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Also with water means one should invite with water for drinking. The meaning should be understood.

original: phyag bya'o // spyod pa bde'am mi 'dri'o //
analyzed: phyag bya'o // spyod pa bde'am mi 'dri'o //
translated: One should bow. One should not ask about well-being.

original: ci nus kyis yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur bar bya'o //
analyzed: ci nus kyis yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur bar bya'o //
translated: One should delight as much as possible.

original: gnas mal rkyen du 'bab pa sbyin no zhes bya ba ni ma mo dag las mthun pas lhung bzed dang chos gos zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gnas mal rkyen du 'bab pa sbyin no zhes bya ba ni ma mo dag las mthun pas lhung bzed dang chos gos zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: One should give a suitable bed and seat.  In the mother scriptures, it is said in accordance with the alms bowl and Dharma robes, and so on.

original: dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi gan du 'gro bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni glo bur ba'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi gan du 'gro bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni glo bur ba'o //
translated: He should go to the elder of the saṃgha.🔽This is for the occasional.

original: tshig de ni glo bur ba lam du mi 'gro ba dag gi phyir gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: tshig de ni glo bur ba lam du mi 'gro ba dag gi phyir gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This statement is for those who are not on the road.

original: des de gnas 'cha' ba la sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /🔽des de zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan des so //
analyzed: des de gnas 'cha' ba la sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba la / des de zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan des so //
translated: He should apply himself to that.🔽“He” means the elder of the saṃgha.

original: de la zhas bya ba ni glo bur du 'ongs pa de la'o //
analyzed: de la zhas bya ba ni glo bur du 'ongs pa de la'o //
translated: “That” means the guest.

original: gal te rgan na de gnas mal bstabs pa'i phyir de'i dge skos la'o zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis gnas mal stobs pa'i dge skol la bsgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: gal te rgan na de gnas mal bstabs pa'i phyir de'i dge skos la'o zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis gnas mal stobs pa'i dge skol la bsgo bar bya'o //
translated: If he is older, he should tell the one who assigns the seats to give him a seat.

original: bab col dug nas mal gsol bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bab col dug nas mal gsol bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: He should not request a seat rashly.

original: 'di ni ma mo dag las legs par so sor brtags te mnod par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni ma mo dag las legs par so sor brtags te mnod par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This is what is said in the Mātṛkā: “One should take it after examining it well.”

original: glo bur du 'ongs pa'i skabs song zin to /
analyzed: glo bur du 'ongs pa'i skabs song zin to /
translated: The section on guests is finished.

original: // / chos gos kyi mtha' zegs na mtha' skar gyis glan zhing phyir bcos so //
analyzed: // / chos gos kyi mtha' zegs na mtha' skar gyis glan zhing phyir bcos so //
translated: If the hem of the robe is torn, it should be mended with a patch.

original: smyung tshams lta bu dag gis de'i gzungs gdab po zhes bya ba ni mtha' skor bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: smyung tshams lta bu dag gis de'i gzungs gdab po zhes bya ba ni mtha' skor bsdus pa'o //
translated: The dhāraṇī should be recited by one who is fasting. This is the summary of the surrounding.

original: ro'i gos ni bla gab med par zhes bya ba smos na phyogs gang du zhe na /
analyzed: ro'i gos ni bla gab med par zhes bya ba smos na phyogs gang du zhe na /
translated: The shroud should be in the open air. Where is that?

original: de'i phyir / shing ljon pa la sogs pa'i steng du'o zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir / shing ljon pa la sogs pa'i steng du'o zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Therefore it is said: on top of trees, etc.

original: nyi ma bdun nam brgyad dam kha cig las lnga 'am drug bzhag ste zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: nyi ma bdun nam brgyad dam kha cig las lnga 'am drug bzhag ste zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Seven or eight suns are placed, or according to some, five or six.

original: de ltar ro'i gos la'o //
analyzed: de ltar ro'i gos la'o //
translated: Thus it is for the shroud.

original: gos 'khrur bcu gnas spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: gos 'khrur bcu gnas spyad par bya'o //
translated: The robe should be used for washing the body.

original: bdag dur khrod pa'o zhes go bar byas nas zhes bya ba la go bar byas nas zhes bya ba ni brjod na don gang la yin zhe na /
analyzed: bdag dur khrod pa'o zhes go bar byas nas zhes bya ba la go bar byas nas zhes bya ba ni brjod na don gang la yin zhe na /
translated: Having made it known that one is a charnel ground dweller, having made it known. What is the meaning of that?

original: de'i phyir bdag dur khrod pa'o zhes 'bod na'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir bdag dur khrod pa'o zhes 'bod na'o //
translated: Therefore it is said: when calling oneself a charnel ground dweller.

original: gtsug lag khang dang khyim bdag tu 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: gtsug lag khang dang khyim bdag tu 'jug par bya'o //
translated: One should enter the monastery and the house of the householder.

original: dur khrod pas bdag gir bya ba ma btang ba la yang spyad pa bsten bar bya ba ni gal te de skad ces brjod pa na /
analyzed: dur khrod pas bdag gir bya ba ma btang ba la yang spyad pa bsten bar bya ba ni gal te de skad ces brjod pa na /
translated: The one who uses the charnel ground should also use what is not given up as his own. If he says this,

original: bdag gir bya ba ma btang ba la yang de ltar longs spyod pa nyid kyis bsten par bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bdag gir bya ba ma btang ba la yang de ltar longs spyod pa nyid kyis bsten par bya ba'i don to //
translated: the meaning is that he should also use what is not given up as his own.

original: khyim gyi sgras ni bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim pa gzung bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: khyim gyi sgras ni bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim pa gzung bar rig par bya'o //
translated: The term “house” should be understood as referring to the houses of brahmins and householders.

original: gang gis longs spyod par bya zhe na /
analyzed: gang gis longs spyod par bya zhe na /
translated: By whom is it to be used?

original: @139a * // de'i phyir bdag gir bya ba ma btang bar yang zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: @139a * // de'i phyir bdag gir bya ba ma btang bar yang zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it says “even what is not given up as his own.”

original: de'i lhung bzed la reg pa yongs su ma btang zhing sbyin pa gang yin pa de la zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i lhung bzed la reg pa yongs su ma btang zhing sbyin pa gang yin pa de la zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is a gift whose bowl is not given up.

original: dge 'dun gyi gnas mal la spyad par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni dur khrod pas so //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi gnas mal la spyad par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni dur khrod pas so //
translated: “One should not use the Saṅgha’s bedding” refers to the one who uses the charnel ground.

original: mchod rten las 'dom gang tsam gyis 'gyed do zhes bya ba la yang dur khrod pas so //
analyzed: mchod rten las 'dom gang tsam gyis 'gyed do zhes bya ba la yang dur khrod pas so //
translated: “One should keep a cubit’s distance from a stūpa” also refers to the one who uses the charnel ground.

original: sbrang yab bcang bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sbrang yab bcang bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: One should carry a fly-whisk.

original: de ji lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: de ji lta bu zhig ce na /
translated: What is it like?

original: de'i phyir bal las byas pa dang / sha na las byas pa'i ras ma 'am 'dab ma'i dog pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir bal las byas pa dang / sha na las byas pa'i ras ma 'am 'dab ma'i dog pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is a cloth made of wool or a cloth made of cotton, or a cloth made of silk.

original: glang po che dang rta dang ba lang gi spu la sogs pa las byas pa mi rung ngo zhes bya ba /
analyzed: glang po che dang rta dang ba lang gi spu la sogs pa las byas pa mi rung ngo zhes bya ba /
translated: It is not suitable to be made of elephant hair, horse hair, cow hair, etc.

original: sbrang bu dag gsod pa'i bdag nyid gang yin pa de yang 'dir bkag pa yin no //
analyzed: sbrang bu dag gsod pa'i bdag nyid gang yin pa de yang 'dir bkag pa yin no //
translated: Also, that which has the nature of killing flies is prohibited here.

original: bal la sogs pa ni dpe tsam du zad kyi /
analyzed: bal la sogs pa ni dpe tsam du zad kyi /
translated: Wool, etc. are merely examples.

original: de bas na gzhan yang rtogs bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na gzhan yang rtogs bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should understand others as well.

original: 'dir yang sbrang skyabs ni don mtshungs pa nyid de de'i phyir de dang bcas par smos par gyur cig ces bya ba 'dir 'di rnam par gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang sbrang skyabs ni don mtshungs pa nyid de de'i phyir de dang bcas par smos par gyur cig ces bya ba 'dir 'di rnam par gzhag pa'o //
translated: Here also, the fly-whisk has the same meaning, so it is mentioned along with it. Thus, this is the presentation here.

original: thams cad du gang zag gis 'khar ba rtsi can nyid dang khro bo nyid mi rung ngo zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: thams cad du gang zag gis 'khar ba rtsi can nyid dang khro bo nyid mi rung ngo zhes bya ba la /
translated: Everywhere, it is not suitable for a person to be a stick-holder or an angry person.

original: thams cad du zhes bya ba ni sbrang yab kyi yu ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
analyzed: thams cad du zhes bya ba ni sbrang yab kyi yu ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
translated: Everywhere means not only on the handle of the fan,

original: 'on kyang gzhan thams cad la yang phyogs gcig tu gyur pa dang yan lag tu gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang gzhan thams cad la yang phyogs gcig tu gyur pa dang yan lag tu gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: but also on all other things, because they are parts of it.

original: sbrang skyabs kyang ngo zhes bya ba yang bcang bar bya'o zhes ji lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: sbrang skyabs kyang ngo zhes bya ba yang bcang bar bya'o zhes ji lta bu zhig ce na /
translated: The word also in the verse line that goes “and the fan” should be supplied in the verse line that goes “and the handle.”

original: de'i phyir / shing bu'i steng du ras kyis g-yogs ba'o zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir / shing bu'i steng du ras kyis g-yogs ba'o zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Therefore, it is said, “It is a cloth covering on a stick.”

original: ji ltar shing bul g-yogs par bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar shing bul g-yogs par bya zhe na /
translated: How is it a covering on a stick?

original: de'i phyir bcings pas so zhes smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir bcings pas so zhes smos so //
translated: Therefore, it is said, “It is bound.”

original: ras ji tsam zhig ces na /🔽khru bzhi dang do pa'o zhes smos te /
analyzed: ras ji tsam zhig ces na / khru bzhi dang do pa'o zhes smos te /
translated: How big is the cloth?🔽It is said, “Four cubits long and two cubits wide.”

original: srid du khru bzhi la zheng khru do pa'i tshad gang la yod pa'i zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: srid du khru bzhi la zheng khru do pa'i tshad gang la yod pa'i zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is a cloth that is four cubits long and two cubits wide.

original: ras khru bcu gnyis pas g-yog go zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: ras khru bcu gnyis pas g-yog go zhes bya ba la /
translated: It is covered with a twelve cubit cloth.

original: ji ltar g-yogs par bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar g-yogs par bya zhe na /
translated: How is it covered?

original: de'i phyir 'byar ba dang bcas par ro zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'byar ba dang bcas par ro zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “along with the joining.

original: ras kyi mtha' ma rnams 'byar ba zhes bya ba 'di skabs nyid kyi phyir shes par bya'o //
analyzed: ras kyi mtha' ma rnams 'byar ba zhes bya ba 'di skabs nyid kyi phyir shes par bya'o //
translated: ” The edges of the cloth are joined, this should be understood from the context.

original: de'i mtha' ni mal chas sbyar ro zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de'i mtha' ni mal chas sbyar ro zhes bya ba la /
translated: “Its edge is joined to the bedding.”

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni g-yogs ma'i ras de la'o //🔽sgo bsegs khar 'dod do zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni g-yogs ma'i ras de la'o // sgo bsegs khar 'dod do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Its” refers to the cloth of the covering.🔽“At the door-jamb” means

original: sbyang skyabs kyi sgo snol mar 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: sbyang skyabs kyi sgo snol mar 'dod pa'o //
translated: at the door-jamb of the privy.

original: tsha bar ni bsil ba sbyar ro //
analyzed: tsha bar ni bsil ba sbyar ro //
translated: “In the hot season, a fan is used.”

original: bsil yab bcad bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bsil yab bcad bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: “The fan is to be cut.”

original: rlung bskyab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bsil yab bo //
analyzed: rlung bskyab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bsil yab bo //
translated: “The wind-protector” is the fan.

original: 'dir bcos ma nyid ni gtso bo ste /
analyzed: 'dir bcos ma nyid ni gtso bo ste /
translated: Here, the artificial is primary,

original: gang zag ni ma yin @139b no ;
analyzed: gang zag ni ma yin @139b no ;
translated: not the person.

original: / de bas na ma zhen par byas pa ni 'dir ma bsdus pa nyid do //
analyzed: / de bas na ma zhen par byas pa ni 'dir ma bsdus pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, the non-attachment is not included here.

original: bsil yab mkhan gyis byas pa dang / ta la'i chang bu'o zhes bya ba ni skyed pa'i cha byad ni ta la'i lo ma'i tshogs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsil yab mkhan gyis byas pa dang / ta la'i chang bu'o zhes bya ba ni skyed pa'i cha byad ni ta la'i lo ma'i tshogs yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The one made by a fan-bearer and the one made of palm-leaf are so called because the shape of the handle is like a palm-leaf.

original: khra khra bo mi rung ngo zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: khra khra bo mi rung ngo zhes bya ba la /
translated: The one with variegated color is not allowed.

original: 'di na dbyig par gtogs pa'i lus spyi la bsnyegs te /
analyzed: 'di na dbyig par gtogs pa'i lus spyi la bsnyegs te /
translated: Here, the body belonging to the staff is generally targeted.

original: de'i phyir lhag ma'i don du 'di'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir lhag ma'i don du 'di'o //
translated: Therefore, this is for the remaining meaning.

original: dge 'dun gyis ni gzhan yang ngo zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis ni gzhan yang ngo zhes bya ba la /
translated: The Saṅgha also has other [staffs].

original: dge 'dun gyis ni bsil yab mkhan gyis byas pa dang ta la'i chang bu las gzhan ko lpags las byas pa dang rma bya'i gshog pa la sogs pa las byas pa dang / khra khra bo ma yin pa las gzhan pa khra khra bor 'dug pa dang /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis ni bsil yab mkhan gyis byas pa dang ta la'i chang bu las gzhan ko lpags las byas pa dang rma bya'i gshog pa la sogs pa las byas pa dang / khra khra bo ma yin pa las gzhan pa khra khra bor 'dug pa dang /
translated: The Saṅgha also has other [staffs] made of leather, made of peacock feathers, etc., other than the one made by a fan-bearer and the one made of palm-leaf, and other than the variegated one, the one with variegated color,

original: yu ba rtsi can dang khra bo yang bcad bar bya'o zhes te dbyug pa de lta bu ni gang zag la bkag par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: yu ba rtsi can dang khra bo yang bcad bar bya'o zhes te dbyug pa de lta bu ni gang zag la bkag par rig par bya'o //
translated: and the one with a resinous handle and variegated color should be cut off. Such a staff should be known as prohibited for individuals.

original: nor bu dang rnga ma'i bsil yab rnyed na mchod rten la dbul lo zhes bya ba ni de'i ched du 'di rnyed par gyur pa blangs pa zhes bya bar 'dir rnam par gzhag par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: nor bu dang rnga ma'i bsil yab rnyed na mchod rten la dbul lo zhes bya ba ni de'i ched du 'di rnyed par gyur pa blangs pa zhes bya bar 'dir rnam par gzhag par rig par bya ste /
translated: This is established here as “taking what is obtained for that purpose.”

original: 'di ni ma mo dag las so //
analyzed: 'di ni ma mo dag las so //
translated: This is from the Mātṛkā.

original: mchod rten kun la yin nam ci sangs rgyas kho na'i la yan nam zhe na /
analyzed: mchod rten kun la yin nam ci sangs rgyas kho na'i la yan nam zhe na /
translated: Is this for all stupas? Or only for the Buddha?

original: de'i phyir nyan thos kyi la yang do zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir nyan thos kyi la yang do zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore it is said, “Also for śrāvakas.”

original: sangs rgyas kyi 'ba' zhig tu ma zad do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi 'ba' zhig tu ma zad do //
translated: It is not only for the Buddha.

original: 'dir gzhung ni dge slong gis rnga ma'i bsil yab nor bu can bcang bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni dge slong gis rnga ma'i bsil yab nor bu can bcang bar mi bya'o //
translated: The text here states: “A monk should not use a yak-tail fan with jewels.

original: ji ste rnyed na blangs te sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten nam nyan thos kyi mchod rten la dbul bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: ji ste rnyed na blangs te sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten nam nyan thos kyi mchod rten la dbul bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: If one obtains it, one should take it and offer it to a stupa of the Buddha or a stupa of a śrāvaka.”

original: stan nang tshangs can dang la ba dang sngas nad tshangs can dang gor bu dag bcad bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni ma mo las /
analyzed: stan nang tshangs can dang la ba dang sngas nad tshangs can dang gor bu dag bcad bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni ma mo las /
translated: The Mātṛkā states: “One should cut a mat with fringes, a woolen blanket, a pillow with fringes, and a patchwork quilt.”

original: dge slong rnams kyis gnas mal dang / stan gyi rjes su gnang ba ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: dge slong rnams kyis gnas mal dang / stan gyi rjes su gnang ba ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The permission to use bedding and seats by monks is as follows:

original: khri dang khri'u dang stan nad tshangs can dang la ba dang sngas nad tshangs can dang / gor bu dang bgo ba'i dge 'dun gyi yang rung gang zag gi yang rung ba'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: khri dang khri'u dang stan nad tshangs can dang la ba dang sngas nad tshangs can dang / gor bu dang bgo ba'i dge 'dun gyi yang rung gang zag gi yang rung ba'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: a bed, a bench, a mattress, a woolen blanket, a pillow, a woolen cover, a robe, whether of the community or an individual.🔽The acquisition of sons and wives is established by the power of giving.

original: bu dang chung ma'i rnyed pa ni sbyin bar byed pa'i dbang gis bsgrub po zhes bya ba ni sbyin bar byed pas ji ltar rnam par nges pa byed pa de bzhin du 'di la rnam par nges par bya ste /
analyzed: bu dang chung ma'i rnyed pa ni sbyin bar byed pa'i dbang gis bsgrub po zhes bya ba ni sbyin bar byed pas ji ltar rnam par nges pa byed pa de bzhin du 'di la rnam par nges par bya ste /
translated: Just as the giver determines it, so it should be determined in this case.

original: sil bu dag las de dang por byas nas gzhan zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa dang / snod spyad sbed pa zhes bya ba dang bor byas te 'dug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa dang / dkon mchog gi don du zhes bya ba dang bor bya ste /
analyzed: sil bu dag las de dang por byas nas gzhan zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa dang / snod spyad sbed pa zhes bya ba dang bor byas te 'dug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa dang / dkon mchog gi don du zhes bya ba dang bor bya ste /
translated: From the scattered texts, beginning with that, up to the end called “another,” and beginning with the concealment of the utensils, up to the end called “one should stay,” and beginning with “for the sake of the Three Jewels,” up to the end called “one should give.”

original: 'khor lo bcad bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa dang / bcu ston la sogs pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya ba dang por bya ste /🔽'chang ba bstan pa zhes bya ba'i @140a * //
analyzed: 'khor lo bcad bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa dang / bcu ston la sogs pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya ba dang por bya ste / 'chang ba bstan pa zhes bya ba'i @140a * //
translated: The final one is the wheel should be cut, and the first is the acquisition of the ten teachers, etc.,

original: mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: mthar thug pa'o //
translated: and the final one is the teaching of the bearer.

original: 'dir gzhung ni ma mo dag las /

translated: The value of the object is not to be deducted from the elder of the community who bought it and who assessed its value.

original: yang mi 'byung bar nges par byas nas bskyed pa la dbab bo zhes bya ba ni gal te slar mi bskyed ces bya ba nges par gyur na de la yang dbab pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: yang mi 'byung bar nges par byas nas bskyed pa la dbab bo zhes bya ba ni gal te slar mi bskyed ces bya ba nges par gyur na de la yang dbab pa nyid yin no //
translated: If it is certain that it will not occur again, it is to be deducted from the increase. If it is certain that it will not occur again, then it is to be deducted from the increase.

original: mi nyo bas bskyed par mi bya'o //
analyzed: mi nyo bas bskyed par mi bya'o //
translated: It is not to be deducted from the one who did not buy it.

original: bud med ni mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bud med ni mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is not to be deducted from a woman.

original: rin thang de ltar bskyed par mi bya'o //
analyzed: rin thang de ltar bskyed par mi bya'o //
translated: It is not to be deducted from the value of the object.

original: rin ma phul gyi bar du spyad pa dang byi dor yang mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rin ma phul gyi bar du spyad pa dang byi dor yang mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is not to be deducted from the use or the repair until the price is paid.

original: bkru ba dang kha bsgyur ba la sogs pa'i byi dor yang mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bkru ba dang kha bsgyur ba la sogs pa'i byi dor yang mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is not to be deducted from the repair, such as washing and dying.

original: bgo @141b skal pa rnams mang ba nyid yin na bcu la sogs pa'i tshoms kyis bgo bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bgo @141b skal pa rnams mang ba nyid yin na bcu la sogs pa'i tshoms kyis bgo bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: If the shares are many, they are to be divided by groups of ten and so on.

original: 'dir bgo skal pa rnams kyi sgra ni tshoms brjod pa'o //🔽phog pa ma bgos par tshoms las 'ga' zhig shi na de'i skal ba tshoms de pa dbang ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni tshogs la phul ba de'i cha ma bsgos par tshogs der 'ga' zhig shi na /🔽'ga' zhig shi ba de'i skal pa gang zhig thob pa'i skal pa de la tshogs gang zhig 'byung ba rnams la de dbang ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'dir bgo skal pa rnams kyi sgra ni tshoms brjod pa'o // phog pa ma bgos par tshoms las 'ga' zhig shi na de'i skal ba tshoms de pa dbang ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni tshogs la phul ba de'i cha ma bsgos par tshogs der 'ga' zhig shi na / 'ga' zhig shi ba de'i skal pa gang zhig thob pa'i skal pa de la tshogs gang zhig 'byung ba rnams la de dbang ba nyid yin no //
translated: The word “share” in the verse means “portion.”🔽If someone dies before the shares have been distributed, the share that would have been his is to be given to those who are present.🔽If someone dies after the shares have been distributed, the share that he would have received is to be given to those who are present.

original: bgos pa'i 'og tu shi na ni de'i skal ba mtshams su gtogs pa'i rab tu byung ba tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis shi ba'i yo byad du byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
analyzed: bgos pa'i 'og tu shi na ni de'i skal ba mtshams su gtogs pa'i rab tu byung ba tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis shi ba'i yo byad du byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
translated: If someone dies after the shares have been distributed, the share that would have been his is to be given to those who are present.🔽If a monk dies after the shares have been distributed, his share is to be given to the monks who are present.

original: mya ngan las 'das ba'i bsam pas rab tu byung zhing tshul khrims dang ldan pa la ni gos stong phrag brgya pa dang / kha zas ro brgya pa dang / khang pa brtsegs pa lnga brgya pa yang 'os so //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das ba'i bsam pas rab tu byung zhing tshul khrims dang ldan pa la ni gos stong phrag brgya pa dang / kha zas ro brgya pa dang / khang pa brtsegs pa lnga brgya pa yang 'os so //
translated: It is appropriate for those who have gone forth with the intention of attaining nirvana and who possess morality to have a hundred thousand robes, a hundred flavors of food, and five hundred tiered houses.

original: dge 'dun gyi rdzas kyang ngo zhes bya bar yang 'os so zhes bya bar yang sbyar ro //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi rdzas kyang ngo zhes bya bar yang 'os so zhes bya bar yang sbyar ro //
translated: It is also appropriate for the property of the Saṅgha.

original: dge 'dun gyi rdzas rnam pa ji lta bu zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi rdzas rnam pa ji lta bu zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What kind of property of the Saṅgha is it?

original: de'i phyir mi slob pa man chad kyi'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir mi slob pa man chad kyi'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore it is said: up to the non-learner.

original: mi slob pa'i dge 'dun man chad kyi rdzas de /
analyzed: mi slob pa'i dge 'dun man chad kyi rdzas de /
translated: The property of the Saṅgha up to the non-learner.

original: ji srid du dgra bcom pa'i dge 'dun dbang ba'i rdzas kyang 'os pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ji srid du dgra bcom pa'i dge 'dun dbang ba'i rdzas kyang 'os pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is also appropriate for the property belonging to the Saṅgha of Arhats. This is the meaning.

original: rnam pa gang la zhe na /
analyzed: rnam pa gang la zhe na /
translated: In what way?

original: tshul khrims dang ldan pa la ni zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: tshul khrims dang ldan pa la ni zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: It is said: for one who possesses morality.

original: so so'i skye bo la yang ngo zhes bya ba la yang ngo zhes bya ba'i sgras 'phags pa 'ba' zhig la 'os par ni ma zad do zhes bya ba bstan to //
analyzed: so so'i skye bo la yang ngo zhes bya ba la yang ngo zhes bya ba'i sgras 'phags pa 'ba' zhig la 'os par ni ma zad do zhes bya ba bstan to //
translated: The word “also” in the phrase “also for ordinary persons” indicates that it is not only for the noble ones.

original: tshul khrims 'chal ba la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyi rdzas 'os pa ma yin pa'o zhes smos pa'i tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims 'chal ba la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyi rdzas 'os pa ma yin pa'o zhes smos pa'i tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: “Not for one with unethical conduct” is a remainder of the phrase “not for one who is not a recipient of the Saṅgha’s property.”

original: le lo can la ni blangs pa dang nye bar spyad pa bu lon du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: le lo can la ni blangs pa dang nye bar spyad pa bu lon du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “For the lazy, it becomes a debt to take and use” means

original: tshul khrims 'chal pa la /
analyzed: tshul khrims 'chal pa la /
translated: that for one with unethical conduct,

original: rnam pa thams cad du mi 'os pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du mi 'os pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it is not suitable in any way.

original: de ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa la rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa la rig par bya'o //
translated: This should be understood as for one with ethical conduct.

original: mtshams kyi nang nyid na gang zag gi gtsug lag khang ngam de'i rnyed pas 'tsho ba la ni dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa 'os so zhes bya ba ni gang zag gi gtsug lag khang yod pa de rnyed pas 'tsho ba'o //
analyzed: mtshams kyi nang nyid na gang zag gi gtsug lag khang ngam de'i rnyed pas 'tsho ba la ni dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa 'os so zhes bya ba ni gang zag gi gtsug lag khang yod pa de rnyed pas 'tsho ba'o //
translated: “Within the same boundary, it is suitable for the Saṅgha’s property in a monastery belonging to an individual or where one lives by receiving that individual’s property” means that in a monastery belonging to an individual, one lives by receiving that individual’s property.

original: gtsug lag khang de'i mtshams kyi nang rol du rnyed pa de 'os pa yin te /
analyzed: gtsug lag khang de'i mtshams kyi nang rol du rnyed pa de 'os pa yin te /
translated: The property found inside the monastery is suitable.

original: ji ltar 'ga' zhig gtsug lag khang 'di la su gnas pa de la rnyed pa 'di tsam zhig khud par 'bul lo zhes de'i rnam pa na rnyed pa de'o //
analyzed: ji ltar 'ga' zhig gtsug lag khang 'di la su gnas pa de la rnyed pa 'di tsam zhig khud par 'bul lo zhes de'i rnam pa na rnyed pa de'o //
translated: Just as if someone were to say, “I offer this much property to whoever dwells in this monastery,” that property belongs to it.

original: de bas na 'di la dge 'dun gyis bgo bar bya ba ma yin te @142a * //
analyzed: de bas na 'di la dge 'dun gyis bgo bar bya ba ma yin te @142a * //
translated: Therefore, the Saṅgha should not divide it.

original: rnyed pa byung na'o //
analyzed: rnyed pa byung na'o //
translated: If property arises,

original: nges pa'i gnas khang na yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: nges pa'i gnas khang na yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: in a certain place,

original: rnyed pas 'tsho zhing dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa la 'os pa'o //
analyzed: rnyed pas 'tsho zhing dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa la 'os pa'o //
translated: one who lives by property and is suitable for the Saṅgha’s property.🔽That should be circulated in turn.🔽The property of a certain place should be circulated by those who produced it.

original: de re mos bsko'o zhes bya ba ni rnyed pa nges pa'i gnas khang de ji ltar bskyed pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba de 'dir thams cad du ji ltar bskyed pa zhes bya ba 'di las grub pa rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de re mos bsko'o zhes bya ba ni rnyed pa nges pa'i gnas khang de ji ltar bskyed pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba de 'dir thams cad du ji ltar bskyed pa zhes bya ba 'di las grub pa rig par bya'o //
translated: Here, it should be understood that “how it is produced” is established by this.

original: lcags las byas pa'i snod spyad dag las lhung bzed dang lhung bzed chung ngu dang tsha snod dang zo phor dang lde mig kyog po dang gri gu dang khab dang sen mo gcod pa dang / nal ze dang thal phyags dang ste re dang slang nga dang phor bu dag ni bgo bar bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: lcags las byas pa'i snod spyad dag las lhung bzed dang lhung bzed chung ngu dang tsha snod dang zo phor dang lde mig kyog po dang gri gu dang khab dang sen mo gcod pa dang / nal ze dang thal phyags dang ste re dang slang nga dang phor bu dag ni bgo bar bya ba nyid do //
translated: razor blades, fans, saucers, and cups.

original: sa'i snod spyad dag las ni lhung bzed dang lhung bzed chung ngu dang slang nga dang bum pa dang bya ma bum dang / gzhong pa dang ril ba spyi blugs dang chu snod rnams so zhes bya ba ni bgo bar bya ba nyid do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //🔽khri ni rin po che las byas pa la sogs pa man chad nas lcags las byas pa'i bar dag go zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sa'i snod spyad dag las ni lhung bzed dang lhung bzed chung ngu dang slang nga dang bum pa dang bya ma bum dang / gzhong pa dang ril ba spyi blugs dang chu snod rnams so zhes bya ba ni bgo bar bya ba nyid do zhes bya bar sbyar ro // khri ni rin po che las byas pa la sogs pa man chad nas lcags las byas pa'i bar dag go zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Earth vessels are to be distributed, such as begging bowls, small begging bowls, saucers, water pots, water strainers, basins, water filters, and water containers.🔽Beds are to be distributed, from those made of jewels down to those made of iron.

original: khri rin po che las byas pa nas lcags las byas pa'i bar yan chad bgo bar bya ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: khri rin po che las byas pa nas lcags las byas pa'i bar yan chad bgo bar bya ba nyid yin no //
translated: Beds made of jewels down to those made of iron are to be distributed.

original: ji ltar bgo bar bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar bgo bar bya zhe na /
translated: How is it to be divided?

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said,

original: rin du btsongs te bgo bar bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rin du btsongs te bgo bar bya ba'i don to //
translated: it is to be divided by selling it for a price.

original: shing las byas pa ni yin no zhes bya ba ni khri ni bgo bar bya ba nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: shing las byas pa ni yin no zhes bya ba ni khri ni bgo bar bya ba nyid ma yin no //
translated: It is made of wood means it is made of wood.

original: tshon rtsi ni lnga las gzhan pa'o zhes bya ba ni tshon chen po lnga las gzhan pa dag bgo bar bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: tshon rtsi ni lnga las gzhan pa'o zhes bya ba ni tshon chen po lnga las gzhan pa dag bgo bar bya ba nyid do //
translated: The dye is other than the five means it is to be divided, other than the five primary dyes.

original: tshon chen po rnams thams cad kyi lnga po nyid ni dpe tsam yin te /
analyzed: tshon chen po rnams thams cad kyi lnga po nyid ni dpe tsam yin te /
translated: The five primary dyes are merely an example.

original: 'dir bsdus pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir bsdus pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: Here, it should be understood as a summary.

original: ci gnas skabs thams cad dam zhe na /
analyzed: ci gnas skabs thams cad dam zhe na /
translated: Is it in all circumstances?🔽Therefore, it is said,

original: de'i phyir ma bskol ba'o zhes bya ba smos te bkol ba ni kha bsgyur bar bya ba la sbyar bar bya ba nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to ;
analyzed: de'i phyir ma bskol ba'o zhes bya ba smos te bkol ba ni kha bsgyur bar bya ba la sbyar bar bya ba nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to ;
translated: it is not boiled, that is, it is to be applied to dyeing.

original: / kha bsgyur bar bya ba gang la sbyar bar bya zhe na /
analyzed: / kha bsgyur bar bya ba gang la sbyar bar bya zhe na /
translated: What is to be applied to dyeing?

original: de'i phyir / dge 'dun gyi la'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir / dge 'dun gyi la'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said,🔽it is for the Saṅgha.

original: kun dga' ra ba dang gtsug lag khang dang de dag gi gzhi dang gnas mal dag ni btsong bar bya ba yang ma yin no zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: kun dga' ra ba dang gtsug lag khang dang de dag gi gzhi dang gnas mal dag ni btsong bar bya ba yang ma yin no zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Monasteries, temples, and their sites and furniture are not to be sold.

original: yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni bgo bar bya ba yang ma yin par bstan no //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni bgo bar bya ba yang ma yin par bstan no //
translated: The word “also” indicates that they are not to be bartered.

original: de dag gi gzhi dang zhes bya ba ni kun dga' ra ba dang gtsug lag khang gi'o //🔽gzhag par bya ba nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba ni de dag gtar gzhag pa nyid kyang ma yin zhes bya ba'i don gyis shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag gi gzhi dang zhes bya ba ni kun dga' ra ba dang gtsug lag khang gi'o // gzhag par bya ba nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba ni de dag gtar gzhag pa nyid kyang ma yin zhes bya ba'i don gyis shes par bya'o //
translated: “Their sites” means the sites of monasteries and temples.🔽“They are not to be set aside” means that they are not to be set aside as gifts.

original: byin gyis brlab par bya ba nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gang zag dang 'brel pa nyid kyis snyam du don gyis shes par @142b bya'o ;
analyzed: byin gyis brlab par bya ba nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gang zag dang 'brel pa nyid kyis snyam du don gyis shes par @142b bya'o ;
translated: “They are not to be consecrated” means that they are not to be consecrated as gifts.

original: / pha ma la zas dang gos kyis gtang bar bya'o zhes bya ba smos na /
analyzed: / pha ma la zas dang gos kyis gtang bar bya'o zhes bya ba smos na /
translated: If it is said that parents are to be supported with food and clothing,

original: ji ltar gtang bar bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar gtang bar bya zhe na /
translated: how are they to be supported?

original: de'i phyir / gal te lhung bzed dang chos gso las lhag pa'i rnyed pa med pa na bslangs te'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir / gal te lhung bzed dang chos gso las lhag pa'i rnyed pa med pa na bslangs te'o //
translated: if there is no gain greater than the bowl and the robes, then one should ask for it.

original: ma grub na zan gyi skal ba las phyed sbyin no zhes bya ba la /🔽ma grub na zhes bya ba ni bslangs pa la de rung ba'i gang zag ma brjod pa'am /
analyzed: ma grub na zan gyi skal ba las phyed sbyin no zhes bya ba la / ma grub na zhes bya ba ni bslangs pa la de rung ba'i gang zag ma brjod pa'am /
translated: If it is not obtained, one should give half of one’s portion of food.

original: bslang bar mi nus ba la rnyed pa ste /
analyzed: bslang bar mi nus ba la rnyed pa ste /
translated: “If it is not obtained” means that one should ask for it, but if no suitable person is mentioned,🔽or if it is not possible to ask for it, then one should give half of one’s portion of food.

original: phran tshegs kyi gzhi la sogs par gtogs pa'o //
analyzed: phran tshegs kyi gzhi la sogs par gtogs pa'o //
translated: This refers to the bases of minor offenses, etc.

original: bye brag shes par bya ba'i phyir chos gos dag la thig le bya'o zhes bya ba ni mi nor bar bya ba'i phyir mtshan ma 'di'o //
analyzed: bye brag shes par bya ba'i phyir chos gos dag la thig le bya'o zhes bya ba ni mi nor bar bya ba'i phyir mtshan ma 'di'o //
translated: In order to know the distinctions, one should make a mark on the robes. This is a sign in order to avoid confusion.

original: sri shu sri shu sri shu chag chag 'debs par byed pa'o zhes 'dir zur chag pa'i khams so //
analyzed: sri shu sri shu sri shu chag chag 'debs par byed pa'o zhes 'dir zur chag pa'i khams so //
translated: “Śiśu śiśu śiśu” is used for sprinkling water. Here it is a Prakrit form from the Khasa region.

original: 'dir gzhung ni dge slong dag khyed kyis /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni dge slong dag khyed kyis /
translated: Here the text is:

original: dge slong mdzes dga' bo'i chos gos dag la thig le byos shig dang 'di ni mdzes dga' ba'o //
analyzed: dge slong mdzes dga' bo'i chos gos dag la thig le byos shig dang 'di ni mdzes dga' ba'o //
translated: “Monks, you should make a mark on the robes of the monk Nanda. This is Nanda’s.”

original: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das so zhes shes par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //🔽de dag la mtshan ma gdab bo zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das so zhes shes par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no // de dag la mtshan ma gdab bo zhes bya ba la /
translated: One should mark them with signs.

original: de dag la zhes bya ba ni chos gos de dag la'o //
analyzed: de dag la zhes bya ba ni chos gos de dag la'o //
translated: On them means on those Dharma robes.

original: snag tsha'i thig le ni des zhes bya ba'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: snag tsha'i thig le ni des zhes bya ba'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: With drops of ink means with that.

original: des zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma gdab pa de'o //
analyzed: des zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma gdab pa de'o //
translated: With that means with the marking of signs.

original: lung dag kyang ngo zhes bya ba ni chos gos dag la gdags so zhes par sbyar ro //
analyzed: lung dag kyang ngo zhes bya ba ni chos gos dag la gdags so zhes par sbyar ro //
translated: And in the scriptures means that they should be marked on the Dharma robes.

original: kha tshar dang phun tshar gyi mtha' rang chag bya'o //
analyzed: kha tshar dang phun tshar gyi mtha' rang chag bya'o //
translated: The edges of the hems and borders should be left as they are.

original: snam spyar ma yin pa dag la dras te byin gyis brlab par nges pa med do zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: snam spyar ma yin pa dag la dras te byin gyis brlab par nges pa med do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is not certain that those that are not patched robes should be cut and consecrated.

original: dras shing drubs pa chos gos nyid du byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes bya ba las snam sbyar gyi cho ga gang zhig mi 'dod pa 'di dang 'dra ba'i dbye bas so //
analyzed: dras shing drubs pa chos gos nyid du byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes bya ba las snam sbyar gyi cho ga gang zhig mi 'dod pa 'di dang 'dra ba'i dbye bas so //
translated: Having cut and sewn, one should consecrate as a Dharma robe itself means that the procedure for patched robes is not desired, as this is a similar classification.

original: rkyen de lta bu dag la de dang de'i rgyan med na gzhan la dngos gzhi'i rnyed pa ma grub pa la /
analyzed: rkyen de lta bu dag la de dang de'i rgyan med na gzhan la dngos gzhi'i rnyed pa ma grub pa la /
translated: If those conditions are not present, then even if one has not previously obtained the basic robe,

original: gdod khas blangs pa dbul ba zhes bya ba ni pham dag rung ba'i bsam pas dras shing drubs pa ma yin pa la yang de yod par 'gyur zhes bya ba de bas na de la 'di byed pa'o //
analyzed: gdod khas blangs pa dbul ba zhes bya ba ni pham dag rung ba'i bsam pas dras shing drubs pa ma yin pa la yang de yod par 'gyur zhes bya ba de bas na de la 'di byed pa'o //
translated: one should make it.

original: 'dir gzhung ni btsun pa chos gos ma dras pa byin gyis brlab tu rung ngam /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni btsun pa chos gos ma dras pa byin gyis brlab tu rung ngam /
translated: Here, the text says, “Venerable, is it permissible to consecrate a robe that has not been cut?”

original: nye ba 'khor mi rung ngo //
analyzed: nye ba 'khor mi rung ngo //
translated: Upāli, it is not permissible.

original: rkyen de lta bu dag na ni rung ngo zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: rkyen de lta bu dag na ni rung ngo zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: If those conditions are present, it is permissible.

original: 'di ltar 'dir chos gos gsungs pa ni snam sbyar kho na yin par rnam par gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'dir chos gos gsungs pa ni snam sbyar kho na yin par rnam par gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Here, the text says “robe” because it is well known that the saṃnāṣa is a robe.

original: der ji ltar mngon zhe na /
analyzed: der ji ltar mngon zhe na /
translated: How is this known?

original: 'di ltar blo gos dang mthang gos gnyis ma dras pa gang yin pa des ni cha lugs rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //🔽ma mos las /

original: de lta bas na dge 'dun gyis gos dag ni sar pa dang ; khar tshar dang phun tshar ring po dag kyang bcang bar gnang ngo zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na dge 'dun gyis gos dag ni sar pa dang ; khar tshar dang phun tshar ring po dag kyang bcang bar gnang ngo zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the Saṅgha is permitted to keep robes that are new, that are of fine material, and that are long.

original: gzhan du ma yang rung bar bya ste bcang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'dir 'chang ba'i nyes pa med par rjes su gnang bar byas so //
analyzed: gzhan du ma yang rung bar bya ste bcang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'dir 'chang ba'i nyes pa med par rjes su gnang bar byas so //
translated: “One may use another’s robe as one’s own” means that it is permitted to use it without the fault of keeping it.

original: skyon mang po mthong ba mi rigs pa'i blo la 'bab ste /
analyzed: skyon mang po mthong ba mi rigs pa'i blo la 'bab ste /
translated: “One should not use a robe that has many faults and that is not suitable.”

original: de bzlog pa'i don du @144b de'o //
analyzed: de bzlog pa'i don du @144b de'o //
translated: This was said in order to stop the use of such a robe.

original: sems mi brtan pa la rung bar mi bya'o /
analyzed: sems mi brtan pa la rung bar mi bya'o /
translated: “One should not use a robe that is not suitable for one who is unstable.”🔽“One should not use a robe that is not suitable for one who is not fully ordained.”

original: bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la mi bya'o zhes bya ba la 'dir gzhung ni /
analyzed: bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la mi bya'o zhes bya ba la 'dir gzhung ni /
translated: The text here is:

original: dge slong dag dge tshul la gos dag tu rung bar byed na /
analyzed: dge slong dag dge tshul la gos dag tu rung bar byed na /
translated: “Monks, if you use a robe that is not suitable for a novice,🔽then give me the garland of robes.”

original: des gos kyi phreng ba phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: des gos kyi phreng ba phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la gos dag rung bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la gos dag rung bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: “One should not use a robe that is not suitable for one who is not fully ordained.”

original: mngon sum du mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mngon sum du mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One should not make it present.

original: gang la rung bar bya ba de'i mngon sum du rung bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: gang la rung bar bya ba de'i mngon sum du rung bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not make it present for one who is suitable to be made present.🔽Even if one goes to another place, the suitability does not lapse.

original: yul gzhan du gnas par gyur pa nyid yin na yang rung ba mi nyams so //
analyzed: yul gzhan du gnas par gyur pa nyid yin na yang rung ba mi nyams so //
translated: The suitability does not lapse even if one goes to another place.🔽The suitability lapses if one who is suitable dies.🔽If one who is suitable dies, the suitability lapses.🔽The suitability lapses if one who is suitable goes elsewhere.

original: shin nyams so zhes bya ba ni gang gi ming gis rung bar bya ba de yul gzhan du gnas par gyur kyang rung ste /🔽de mi nyams so //
analyzed: shin nyams so zhes bya ba ni gang gi ming gis rung bar bya ba de yul gzhan du gnas par gyur kyang rung ste / de mi nyams so //
translated: If one who is suitable goes elsewhere, the suitability lapses.🔽The suitability lapses if one who is suitable is expelled.

original: gang la rung bar byas pa de shin tu rung bar nyams pa'o //
analyzed: gang la rung bar byas pa de shin tu rung bar nyams pa'o //
translated: If one who is suitable is expelled, the suitability lapses.🔽The suitability lapses if one who is suitable is suspended.

original: ci gang gi tshe shi ba de'i tshe kho na na de nyams sam zhe na /🔽de'i phyir shes na'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: ci gang gi tshe shi ba de'i tshe kho na na de nyams sam zhe na / de'i phyir shes na'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: If one who is suitable is suspended, the suitability lapses.🔽The suitability lapses if one who is suitable is a wrong-doer.🔽If one who is suitable is a wrong-doer, the suitability lapses.

original: de shi bar shes na'o //
analyzed: de shi bar shes na'o //
translated: The suitability lapses if one who is suitable is insane.🔽If one who is suitable is insane, the suitability lapses.🔽The suitability lapses if one who is suitable is possessed.🔽If one who is suitable is possessed, the suitability lapses.🔽The suitability lapses if one who is suitable is mutinous.

original: 'di la rung bar byed pa bdag nyid do zhes bya ba ni rung bar byas pa'i dngos po 'di la gang zhig rung bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'di la rung bar byed pa bdag nyid do zhes bya ba ni rung bar byas pa'i dngos po 'di la gang zhig rung bar byed pa'o //
translated: If one who is suitable is mutinous, the suitability lapses.🔽The suitability lapses if one who is suitable is suspended for refusing to acknowledge an offense.🔽If one who is suitable is suspended for refusing to acknowledge an offense, the suitability lapses.🔽The suitability lapses if one who is suitable is suspended for refusing to make amends for an offense.🔽If one who is suitable is suspended for refusing to make amends for an offense, the suitability lapses.🔽The suitability lapses if one who is suitable is suspended for refusing to give up a bad view.🔽If one who is suitable is suspended for refusing to give up a bad view, the suitability lapses.🔽The suitability lapses if one who is suitable is a paṇḍaka.🔽If one who is suitable is a paṇḍaka, the suitability lapses.🔽The suitability lapses if one who is suitable is a hermaphrodite.🔽If one who is suitable is a hermaphrodite, the suitability lapses.

original: spangs pa bdag gir mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyis sam gang zag gis so //
analyzed: spangs pa bdag gir mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyis sam gang zag gis so //
translated: The suitability lapses if one who is suitable is a monk who has been ejected for not recognizing an offense.🔽If one who is suitable is a monk who has been ejected for not recognizing an offense, the suitability lapses.🔽The suitability lapses if one who is suitable is a monk who has been ejected for not making amends for an offense

original: dge slong la spang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dge slong la spang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun la ni ma yin no //
translated: The phrase should be relinquished to the monk means that the monk should not relinquish it to the saṅgha.

original: mi gsal ba la yang mi bya'o //
analyzed: mi gsal ba la yang mi bya'o //
translated: The phrase should not be relinquished to one who is not clear means that it should not be relinquished to one who is not a monk.

original: ma byin par ni blang ngo zhes bya ba ni spangs pa'i gos gang la des phyir ma byin na spong bar byed pas phyir blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: ma byin par ni blang ngo zhes bya ba ni spangs pa'i gos gang la des phyir ma byin na spong bar byed pas phyir blang bar bya'o //
translated: The phrase should be taken back means that if the monk who is the object of the relinquishment does not return the robe, the one who relinquished it may take it back.

original: mthus kyang dgug go zhes bya ba ni ma byin na zhes rjes snyegs pa'i phyir kyang zhes bya ba'i sgra smos so //🔽gos dri ma dag gis gos pa bkrus te bgo bar bya'o //🔽phye ma dag gis ni sgrugs te'o zhes bya ba ni yongs su dag pa'i gos la long spyad pa'o //
analyzed: mthus kyang dgug go zhes bya ba ni ma byin na zhes rjes snyegs pa'i phyir kyang zhes bya ba'i sgra smos so // gos dri ma dag gis gos pa bkrus te bgo bar bya'o // phye ma dag gis ni sgrugs te'o zhes bya ba ni yongs su dag pa'i gos la long spyad pa'o //
translated: The phrase should be summoned by force means that if the monk who is the object of the relinquishment does not return the robe, the one who relinquished it may take it back.🔽The phrase should be washed means that if the robe is soiled, it should be washed and then worn.🔽The phrase should be beaten means that if the robe is soiled, it should be beaten and then worn.

original: snum gyis ni rtsub par byas te'o zhes bya ba ni gos snum gyis gos na thal chu la sogs pas rtsub par byas te bgo bar bya'o //🔽de dag gi ni mi sdug pa bsal ba yin gyi /
analyzed: snum gyis ni rtsub par byas te'o zhes bya ba ni gos snum gyis gos na thal chu la sogs pas rtsub par byas te bgo bar bya'o // de dag gi ni mi sdug pa bsal ba yin gyi /
translated: The phrase should be made rough means that if the robe is soiled, it should be made rough with lye and then worn.🔽The phrase should be removed means that the robe should be removed from the body.

original: gsog 'jog tu gyur pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gsog 'jog tu gyur pa ni ma yin te /
translated: The phrase should be stored means that the robe should be stored in a place that is not hidden.

original: mi bden pa de gang zhig 'dir kha cig ni 'dod pa de gsog 'jog ni zas dang 'brel pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi bden pa de gang zhig 'dir kha cig ni 'dod pa de gsog 'jog ni zas dang 'brel pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: What is not true? Some say that it is not true that the Saṅgha should not distribute the rainy season retreat robe when it rains.

original: char 'bab pa'i tshe bla gab med par dge 'dun gyi mi bgo'o zhes bya ba ni bgo bar mi bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: char 'bab pa'i tshe bla gab med par dge 'dun gyi mi bgo'o zhes bya ba ni bgo bar mi bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The phrase “when it rains” is connected to the phrase “should not distribute.”

original: bkru bshal dang tshon dang lhung bzed kyi las dang shing gsheg pa la sogs pa de'i tshe mi bgo'o zhes bya @145a * //
analyzed: bkru bshal dang tshon dang lhung bzed kyi las dang shing gsheg pa la sogs pa de'i tshe mi bgo'o zhes bya @145a * //
translated: When washing, dyeing, working on the alms-bowl, cutting wood, and so on, the Saṅgha robe should not be distributed.

original: ba ni dge 'dun gyi gos mi bgo ba'o //🔽lhan cig nyid la zhes bya ba mi bgon lhan cig dang bral ba'i phyir 'doms pa la byin pa ni yang dag pa nyid kyi grangs yin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: ba ni dge 'dun gyi gos mi bgo ba'o // lhan cig nyid la zhes bya ba mi bgon lhan cig dang bral ba'i phyir 'doms pa la byin pa ni yang dag pa nyid kyi grangs yin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: This means that the Saṅgha robe should not be distributed.🔽The phrase “only together” means that the Saṅgha robe should not be distributed to those who are not together.

original: lhan cig nyid la zhes bya ba ni kho bo cag la 'di sbyin bar bya'o //
analyzed: lhan cig nyid la zhes bya ba ni kho bo cag la 'di sbyin bar bya'o //
translated: The phrase “only together” means that the Saṅgha robe should be given to those who are together.

original: 'doms pa po rnams kyis bya ba ma bsgo na gang zhig der gzhan gcig gam du ma grogs byed pa 'doms par byed pa po de spangs nas 'doms par byed pa la byin pa ni yang dag pa nyid kyi grangs de'o //
analyzed: 'doms pa po rnams kyis bya ba ma bsgo na gang zhig der gzhan gcig gam du ma grogs byed pa 'doms par byed pa po de spangs nas 'doms par byed pa la byin pa ni yang dag pa nyid kyi grangs de'o //
translated: If the person who is to be directed does not direct another or many to take it, then the gift is given to the one who directs the taking, after excluding the one who directs. This is the correct procedure.

original: 'dir gzhung ni /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni /
translated: Here is the text:

original: btsun pa re zhig skye bo bzhis gos gtams par gyur pa gcig gis len na stsal bar bgyi'am /
analyzed: btsun pa re zhig skye bo bzhis gos gtams par gyur pa gcig gis len na stsal bar bgyi'am /
translated: “Lord, if one person is surrounded by four people who are taking his clothes, should he give or not?”

original: nye ba 'khor sbyin bar bya'o zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: nye ba 'khor sbyin bar bya'o zhes gsungs so //
translated: “Upāli, he should give.”

original: bye brag 'di ma smos te /
analyzed: bye brag 'di ma smos te /
translated: This distinction is not mentioned.

original: shugs kyis 'di la lta ba mthong ba de bas na 'di smos so //
analyzed: shugs kyis 'di la lta ba mthong ba de bas na 'di smos so //
translated: But since it is seen in the scriptures, it is mentioned here.

original: 'doms par byed pa dang bcas pa la mi sbyin no zhes bya ba ni 'doms par byed pa ma yin pa'i gang zag dang lhan cig len du 'ongs na bskur bar mi bya zhes bya ba'i don te /
analyzed: 'doms par byed pa dang bcas pa la mi sbyin no zhes bya ba ni 'doms par byed pa ma yin pa'i gang zag dang lhan cig len du 'ongs na bskur bar mi bya zhes bya ba'i don te /
translated: “One should not give to one who is accompanied by a director” means that if a person who is not a director comes to take it, one should not give it.

original: dngos po de bdag po ma yin ba gzhan la yang sbyin par 'gyur ba dang / bskur bar 'gyur ba dang / bdag po la zhes bya ba ni de'i rgyu rig par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po de bdag po ma yin ba gzhan la yang sbyin par 'gyur ba dang / bskur bar 'gyur ba dang / bdag po la zhes bya ba ni de'i rgyu rig par bya'o //
translated: It is also giving to others who are not the owners, and it is giving to the owner.🔽The mad person should not take from the house of one who is not a relative.

original: smyon pas nye du ma yin ba dang de'i khyim nas blangs pa la blang bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni smyon pas rang gi nye du ma yin pa'i khyim nas blangs ba dang / de las gzhan ba yang rung ste des gang blangs ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: smyon pas nye du ma yin ba dang de'i khyim nas blangs pa la blang bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni smyon pas rang gi nye du ma yin pa'i khyim nas blangs ba dang / de las gzhan ba yang rung ste des gang blangs ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The mad person should not take from the house of one who is not a relative, or from any other place.

original: 'dir gzhung ni gang na pa'am ma'am phu nu 'am srid mo mngon par rang gi khyim nas sbyin par byed pa de las blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni gang na pa'am ma'am phu nu 'am srid mo mngon par rang gi khyim nas sbyin par byed pa de las blang bar bya'o //
translated: The text says: “If one’s mother, father, brother, or sister gives from their own house, one should take from them.”

original: gang las blang bar mi bgyi /
analyzed: gang las blang bar mi bgyi /
translated: “From whom should one not take?”

original: gang na pha ma la sogs pa mi mngon ba nas nas so zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dir gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gang na pha ma la sogs pa mi mngon ba nas nas so zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dir gsungs pa yin no //
translated: “From one’s mother, father, and so on, who are not visible, one should take from the field.”

original: nye ba dang 'brel ba de la ni sbyin pa'am nye du gang gis blangs pa'am zhes bya ba yid ches pa'i gtso bo pha ma la sogs par gtams pa yin no //
analyzed: nye ba dang 'brel ba de la ni sbyin pa'am nye du gang gis blangs pa'am zhes bya ba yid ches pa'i gtso bo pha ma la sogs par gtams pa yin no //
translated: The near or related one is the one who is entrusted by the parents, etc. who are the principal ones to be trusted, and who is taken by the one who gives or by the relative.

original: gsal la mi gsal gyis 'dir bya ba nyid du rnam bar gzhag pas de lta bas na de ltar nye bar btags pa'o //
analyzed: gsal la mi gsal gyis 'dir bya ba nyid du rnam bar gzhag pas de lta bas na de ltar nye bar btags pa'o //
translated: Since it is established as to be taken here by the one who is both clear and not clear, it is designated in that way.

original: dge slong bram ze'i bu mos zhus pa las /
analyzed: dge slong bram ze'i bu mos zhus pa las /
translated: From the Sūtra Requested by the Bhikṣu Brahmā's Son, it says:

original: mdo 'di dang phyi ma gnyis rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mdo 'di dang phyi ma gnyis rig par bya'o //
translated: One should understand this sūtra and the next two.

original: bu bskrad pa las blang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni phas bu re zhig bskrad pa'i lag nas rdzas blang bar bya ba ste /
analyzed: bu bskrad pa las blang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni phas bu re zhig bskrad pa'i lag nas rdzas blang bar bya ba ste /
translated: One should take from the one who is expelled by the father. This means that one should take the wealth from the hand of the son who is for the time being expelled by the father,

original: bu de pha'i khyim gyi bdag po las phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir snyam du dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: bu de pha'i khyim gyi bdag po las phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir snyam du dgongs pa'o //
translated: thinking that the son will not return to the house of the father.

original: dur khrod nas phyir zlog pa la yang ngo @145b zhes bya ba ni zlog pa blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: dur khrod nas phyir zlog pa la yang ngo @145b zhes bya ba ni zlog pa blang bar bya'o //
translated: Also, from the one who is turned away from the charnel ground. This means that one should take the turned away one.

original: dur khrod pas ni gtsug lag khang du 'jug par bya ba nyid dang bza' bar bya ba nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: dur khrod pas ni gtsug lag khang du 'jug par bya ba nyid dang bza' bar bya ba nyid ma yin te /
translated: The charnel ground practitioner should not enter the monastery, nor should he eat there.

original: gtsug lag khang du gnas pa rnams kyis zhes bya ba gzhan la blang bar bya ba nyid 'di la bsam par byed pa rnams la 'di smos so //
analyzed: gtsug lag khang du gnas pa rnams kyis zhes bya ba gzhan la blang bar bya ba nyid 'di la bsam par byed pa rnams la 'di smos so //
translated: This is for the sake of those who dwell in the monastery, who are to be respected by others.

original: phyir 'gugs na sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba ni dur khrod nas phyir bzlog pa rnyed pa la'o //
analyzed: phyir 'gugs na sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba ni dur khrod nas phyir bzlog pa rnyed pa la'o //
translated: If he is summoned, he should give, meaning that he should give what he has obtained from the charnel ground.

original: dman la mngon par zhen pa 'di lta bu ma yin pa gzhan la de bas na 'di ma grub pa nyid smos par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: dman la mngon par zhen pa 'di lta bu ma yin pa gzhan la de bas na 'di ma grub pa nyid smos par rig par bya'o //
translated: This is not for those who are attached to inferior vehicles, but for others. Therefore, it should be understood that this is not established for them.

original: yang rnyed na blang ngo zhes bya ba ni go skabs dbye ba'am phul ba de blang bar bya ste /
analyzed: yang rnyed na blang ngo zhes bya ba ni go skabs dbye ba'am phul ba de blang bar bya ste /
translated: If he obtains it again, he should accept it, meaning that he should accept the opportunity or offering that is given.

original: de ni des khro ba mi brtan par byas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'dir rgyu'o //
analyzed: de ni des khro ba mi brtan par byas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'dir rgyu'o //
translated: The reason for this is that he should not be unstable in his anger.

original: mchod rten gyi dkor dang 'byung khung dang rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu dang bu ram shing las gzhan ba'i zas kyi don dang / bsko bas nye bar 'tsho bar bya ba dang / na ba'i rung ba ni bdag gir bya ba'i phyir bgo bar mi bya ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba la /🔽mchod rten gyi dkor zhes bya bya ni dge 'dun gyis thob par bya ba nyid kyi phyir /🔽bcom ldan 'das la shi ba'i yo byad 'di la zhes bya ba thob pa la sogs pa'o //🔽rnam pa thams cad du dkon mchog tha dad pa yin ba'i phyir /

analyzed: de'i don ni 'di yin te /

analyzed: zas 'god par byed pa po nye bar 'god pas dang por dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan par gsol bar bya'o //

translated: If the amount of food is much and the number of monks is few, then he should look at the assembly and say, “Announce what is available.”

original: de'i tshe snga ma brjod cing ji ltar khyed par brims shig ces bsgo bar bya'o zhes bya ba zas nye bar gzhag pa na dang por sbyin pa'i phyir dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis bsgo bar bya'o //

translated: At that time, the senior monk of the saṅgha should say, “Recite the previous one and distribute it as much as you can.”

original: rgan pa'i mthar sam sra ba ta zhes ma brjod par dang por blang bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni dang por zhes bya ba'i sgras ni dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: rgan pa'i mthar sam sra ba ta zhes ma brjod par dang por blang bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni dang por zhes bya ba'i sgras ni dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: “One should not take the first portion without saying ‘svasti’ at the end of the senior-most.” The word “first” is connected to “of the saṅgha.”

original: zas bsdogs pa na bskos pa dag las gzhan ba dag lhags na de la sbran bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni gzhan pa'i ma bskos pa dag lhags nas sbyin bdag de la sbran bar bya'o //
analyzed: zas bsdogs pa na bskos pa dag las gzhan ba dag lhags na de la sbran bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni gzhan pa'i ma bskos pa dag lhags nas sbyin bdag de la sbran bar bya'o //
translated: “When the food is ready, if others than those appointed come, they should be informed.” If other unappointed people come, they should be informed.

original: dge slong chos gos gsum sbyin du gzhug par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong chos gos gsum sbyin du gzhug par mi bya'o //
translated: “One should not make a monk give away his three robes.”

original: dge 'dun gyi sos par gyur pa nyid na 'di sbyin no snyam pa las gzhan ba'i yid kyis blang bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba la 'di zhes bya ba ni chos gos gsum po 'di'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi sos par gyur pa nyid na 'di sbyin no snyam pa las gzhan ba'i yid kyis blang bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba la 'di zhes bya ba ni chos gos gsum po 'di'o //
translated: One should not take it with a different thought, thinking, “I will give it when the Saṅgha is complete.”

original: sos par gyur pa nyid na zhes bya ba ni gal te shi bar dogs pa de'i tshe 'di phyir sbyin no snyam par don gyis rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: sos par gyur pa nyid na zhes bya ba ni gal te shi bar dogs pa de'i tshe 'di phyir sbyin no snyam par don gyis rtogs par bya'o //
translated: “When the Saṅgha is complete” means that if there is doubt about death, then it should be understood that the meaning is, “I will give it back when the Saṅgha is complete.”

original: dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni 'dir de smos pa zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni 'dir de smos pa zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'o //
translated: “Of the Saṅgha” means that here it is said to be included in the Saṅgha.

original: gang zag la yang de rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: gang zag la yang de rtogs par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood in the same way for an individual.

original: langs pa de nyid la 'di phul bar gyur ba 'di la'o zhes bya ba 'di'i dgongs pas bzung ba la skyon med de @148b gzhan du na nyes byas zhes bya ba'i don to //

translated: There is no fault in taking it with the thought, “This is given to that very person who has arisen,” but otherwise there is an offense.

original: stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs kyi ro dor ro //
analyzed: stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs kyi ro dor ro //
translated: The corpse of the upper robe and the corpse of the lower robe are cast off.

original: 'bring gis so zhes bya ba ni ngan pa yang ma yin bzang po yang ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'bring gis so zhes bya ba ni ngan pa yang ma yin bzang po yang ma yin pa'o //
translated: “By the middle” means neither bad nor good.

analyzed: lhag mas mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs las gzhan pa'i rdzas lhag mas ro dor bar mi bya ste /

original: bkag pa'i phyir 'dir gsungs so //
analyzed: bkag pa'i phyir 'dir gsungs so //
translated: It is mentioned here because it is prohibited.

original: lhag ma yang de nyid du bsre bar mi rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: lhag ma yang de nyid du bsre bar mi rigs pa yin no //

original: ci ro'i rdzas bzung bas zhes bya ba'i blo bsal ba'i don du de'o //
analyzed: ci ro'i rdzas bzung bas zhes bya ba'i blo bsal ba'i don du de'o //
translated: What is the purpose of the statement, “One should not do it with the substance of the corpse”?🔽One should not enter a village without tying one’s belt.

original: ska rags ma bcings pas grong du 'jug par mi bya'o //🔽khris gcig gis kyang ngo //
analyzed: ska rags ma bcings pas grong du 'jug par mi bya'o // khris gcig gis kyang ngo //

analyzed: gos kyi gzhi phran tshegs la sogs ba'i zhu ba bcas pa'i skabs so //
translated: This concludes the chapter on the basis of the robe, etc.

original: gos kyi gzhi rdzogs so /
analyzed: gos kyi gzhi rdzogs so /
translated: The chapter on the basis of the robe is concluded.

original: // / mtha' khob nges par shes par bya ba'i phyir yul dbus bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: // / mtha' khob nges par shes par bya ba'i phyir yul dbus bstan par bya ste /

analyzed: de'i phyir yul dbus kyi mtshams so zhes bya ba smos te /

analyzed: shar du ni li khar shing 'phel gyi mdun gyi nags phung po tshang tshing can zhes bya ba'o //

analyzed: 'dir nags kyi cha gzhan mtshams su rnam par gnas pa yin te /
translated: The other parts of the forest are the boundary.

original: de'i nub kyi cha tshun chad dbus kyi mtshams so //
analyzed: de'i nub kyi cha tshun chad dbus kyi mtshams so //
translated: The western part of the forest is the boundary of the central region.

original: lhor ni 'dam bu can gyi lhon chu klung de zhes bya ba'o zhes bya ba la /🔽de zhes bya ba ni lho phyogs kyi cha la'o //🔽de'i lho na chu klung 'dam bu can zhes bya ba yod pa'i byang gi cha tshun chad ni /
analyzed: lhor ni 'dam bu can gyi lhon chu klung de zhes bya ba'o zhes bya ba la / de zhes bya ba ni lho phyogs kyi cha la'o // de'i lho na chu klung 'dam bu can zhes bya ba yod pa'i byang gi cha tshun chad ni /
translated: In the south, the river is called the River of Reeds.🔽The River of Reeds is in the southern part of the central region.

original: yul dbus kyi lho phyogs kyi mtshams yin no //
analyzed: yul dbus kyi lho phyogs kyi mtshams yin no //
